title: News Bites: Bitmain vs Equihash
subtitle: 08 May 2018
body:
It's been a busy few days. He's what you might have missed, if you were under rock or doing digital detox.

# [Bitmain releases Z9 Mini ASIC targeting Equihash](https://twitter.com/BITMAINtech/status/992034662875779072)
**Bitmain sent shockwaves through the crypto community when it announced the release of a new ASIC miner: the [Z9 Mini](https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020180503154806494uGcSyiu806FD).  Bitmain ;limited purchases of the Z9 to one per person "to prevent hoarding", but that didn't stop them rapidly filling their pre-order quota â€” it's now sold out*

> One has to question the true motivation behind the "one per person" limit. No doubt Bitmain have been putting the Z9 to work for several weeks and will continue to do so. I suspect some of those who purchased the Z9 Mini will be receiving a very well-tested machine...
